attributes.action: Complete a detailed audit of all Police force expenditure on salaries and overtime to detect and prevent corruption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police services of England and Wales spend milllions of pounds on police and support staff salaries. Police personnell are often paid enhanced rates of overtime frequently at double and triple time. This represents a massive drain on public finances with little or no control and generally with a "rubber stamp" from senior officers this in turn breeds laziness and corruption on the part of our public servants.
